article.title: Status and history for [ven]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: This translation is no longer available on the OHCHR site. It has been replaced and the new translation is available as [ven2].
stage 4: XML version contributed by Emmanuel Vallois.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source.
